title: TPACK-Based Constructivist Mathematics Education Design Advanced Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of mathematics education theory, experience in digital tool utilization, and understanding of constructivist learning theory
context.additional_context: A process for in-service mathematics teachers to strengthen their instructional design capabilities by combining TPACK and constructivist approaches to meet 21st-century educational demands.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the TPACK framework for designing constructivist mathematics lessons with 90% accuracy
Learners can design three or more learner-centered collaborative problem-solving activities using digital tools
Learners can write analytical reports on TPACK component interactions (technology/pedagogy/content knowledge) in educational settings
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
